--------------------------------------------------
ID: C5EDCX4_00
From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-18 13:22
Subject: Hijri New Year, Live with ExCom, Leadership in Action: The Culture Bootcamp, Welcome Sohail Sarwar, Growing Together, Leading Forward
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/7bd5342f9121e1899b6dddeeb18dba462035678822.png> 	

On the occasion of Hijri New Year, our UAE offices will close on Friday, 27th of June. We will resume work on Monday, 30th of June.

Frontline and warehouse employees will follow the timings of their malls, stores, and work locations.

We extend our greetings to all of you, your families, and loved ones!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/f6f94f4f0a77d3a52f8897f5c482fd51836209232.gif> 	

Today, we highlight two ExCom members at the forefront of our brands and partnerships, David and Jasmina, as they walk us through how we're building resilience, results, and relationships across the region.

chunks.text:
Today, we highlight two ExCom members at the forefront of our brands and partnerships, David and Jasmina, as they walk us through how we're building resilience, results, and relationships across the region.


Watch the videos here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1262&user=10620>  and remember to submit your questions anonymously in advance here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1263&user=10620> .​

Register here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1264&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1262&user=10620> 	




David highlights how our brands are adapting to market realities while pushing for profitable growth and the importance of speed, accountability, and alignment to drive impact on the ground.




Jasmina shows how we’re strengthening partnerships through collaboration and trust and shares her outlook on how our Joint Ventures can unlock value through agility and shared ambition.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1262&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-3-min.png> 	

Leadership in Action: The Culture Bootcamp

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1265&user=10620>

chunks.text:
<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1262&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-3-min.png> 	

Leadership in Action: The Culture Bootcamp

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1265&user=10620> 	

Last week, our senior leaders came together for the first Executive Culture Bootcamp, an immersive experience to reflect on what it truly means to lead culture at Chalhoub Group. Through bold conversations and hands-on activities, they explored the core principles that shape how we work and the vital role they play in bringing “One Team, One Culture” to life.

Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1265&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-2-min.png> 	

Welcome Sohail Sarwar

Sohail Sarwar joins the Group as Director – Tech Operations, reporting directly to David Smith. He brings over 18 years of global experience in leading high-impact support and technology operations. 
Sohail will modernise our end user services by shifting from SLA-based delivery to an experience-driven approach, leading AI-powered support, streamlining digital tools, and elevating how teams interact with technology.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1266&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1266&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-4-min.png> 	

Growing Together, Leading Forward

chunks.text:
<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1266&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-4-min.png> 	

Growing Together, Leading Forward 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1267&user=10620> 	

As we close this LeadForward recap series, we’re ending on a theme that strikes at the heart of exceptional leadership: From Cooperation to Proactive Collaboration. This final theme focused on how we build trust, align around what matters, and challenge each other to grow, not just as teammates, but as true partners. It’s a reminder that great leadership isn’t just about leading others, it’s about growing together. Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1267&user=10620> 

For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1268&user=10620>  

Copyright © 2025 Chalhoub Group. All rights reserved. 

You are receiving this email because your are a part of the Chalhoub Group family. 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/newsletter-open.php?nli=284&user=10620>
